product_name: Old Town Old Town Dirigo 106 Kayak
long_description: This friendly, easy-to-paddle recreational kayak has a roomy cockpit and excellent initial stability, making it a great boat for the novice paddler looking to expand his or her paddling skills.
short_description: This friendly, easy-to-paddle recreational kayak has a roomy cockpit and excellent initial stability, making it a great boat for the novice paddler looking to expand his or her paddling skills.
